Package com.github.gwtd3.api.functions

Interface Summary
DatumFunction<T> A function taking an element and the index of the element in the selection, returning a value of type T.
KeyFunction<T> A function used to control how data is joined to elements.
TimerFunction A function to be used with D3#timer().
 

Class Summary
CountFunction A DatumFunction that counts something, mainly used as a debugging purpose in Selection.each(DatumFunction) method.
